Class Kinect

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CameraInterface

    public class Kinect
extends java.lang.Object
implements CameraInterface
    Implementation of the CameraInterface using the Kinect by Microsoft
    Author:
    ketsio

    • Method Detail

      • getNextKinect

        public static CameraInterface getNextKinect(processing.core.PApplet parrent)
                                     throws NoCameraConnectedException
        Return the next kinect camera available If there is only one kinect connected, it returns that kinect the first time we call that function but throws a NoCameraConnectedException if we call it again
        Parameters:
        parrent - the PApplet class used in the project
        Returns:
        the next kinect available as a CameraInterface
        Throws:
        NoCameraConnectedException - if no other camera are connected
